title: Defense Contractor Employee Jailed for Selling 8 Zero-Days to Russian Broker
description: A 39-year-old Australian national who was previously employed at U.S. defense contractor L3Harris has been sentenced to a little over seven years in prison for selling eight zero-day exploits to Russian exploit broker Operation Zero in exchange for millions of dollars.
